text.subtitle: Association of Southeast Asian Nations or the ASEAN community, has the goal to unite 10 ASEAN countries
including Thailand, Myanmar, Laos, Cambodia, Vietnam, Malaysia, Singapore, Indonesia, Philippines and Brunei
to increase their bargaining power, capabilities, and competitiveness of ASEAN in the international arena
To strengthen ASEAN countries as the larger cooperation in order to impart greatness to deal with upcoming issues
The Royal Regalia Museum is the place to visit in Brunei
Asean countries voted this place as the best museum to visit
Collection of relics and monumental items from past Sultan of Brunei to the current ones, as well as gift from visited leaders around the world are exhibited here
Jame Ar’ Hassanil Bolkiah Mosque is the sacred place from Bruneian
Its great architecture is full of extravagant decoration from all around the world
The construction lasted more than 7 years
The mosque is consisted of 2 main praying rooms for male and female
There are 29 steps leading to the praying rooms
The praying room is decorated with expensive golden yellow carpet shining like gold
Omar Ali Saifuddin Mosque has been the place for Bruneian to perform Islamic rituals for several decades
The mosque is located at the center of Bandar Seri Begawan
Its beauty is renowned as the smaller Taj Mahal
The Brunei Museum
The interior is divided into 5 exhibit zones
The most prominent one is the Islamic Arts Gallery that brings together a collection of ancient treasure of the sultan from Muslim countries around the world
Scripture of Al-Quran here is the smallest in the world
There are modeling of life and culture of Bruneian civilization since its birth
Another room that cannot miss is the one with the history of discovery of massive amount of oil and natural gas
This discovery turned Brunei to one of the richest countries in the world
Kampong Ayer is water village the largest in the world
Visitors can enjoy the view of thousands of Art building houses at the estuary of Brunei and the distinctive transportation system
The first Europeans arrived in Brunei called this water village the Venice of the East
The water village is one of the biggest community on water on Earth
There are 42 villages inhabited by more than 30,000 people, the commuting is by a Brunei style speed boat (a wooden boat with engine)
The riding fee is one dollar
Salamutdatung
Salamutdatung
Language: Malay is the official language, English, Chinese
Population: Mainly Malay
Religion: Islam
Government system: Monarchy
Currency: Bruneian dollar
The national flower is Simpor, or what is also known as Dillenia
This flower of Brunei has large petal in yellow color
When the flower is fully bloomed, it will look like an umbrella
Simpor can be seen along the river in Brunei
The flower has anticeptic properties that can heel wounds
Ambuyat is the most popular dish of Brunei
Its distinct character is the thick and sticky like porridge
Saku flour is its main ingredient
The flour itself doesn't have much flavor but it is meant to be complemented with sour fruit sauces
The best way to eat Ambuyat is when it is hot
The national dress of Brunei is similar to the national male's dress of Malaysia,
which is called Baju Melayu
For female, the dress is called Baju Kurung
Normally Bruneian women wear colorful attire and must cover from the head to toe
Men usually wear long sleeves shirt
The shirt reaches down to knee level
Pants or Sarong are typical for traditional men's attire
Bandar Seri Begawan is the capital city of Brunei and also the major portal city
The name was used to be Brunei before the declaration of independence from the authority of England
Now Bandar Seri Begawan is the center of business district and industrial development
Major oil refinery of the country is also located here
Buena Ken is the best place for diving in Indonesia
The island is part of the Marine Park of Buena Ken where can explore more than 70 fish species living in the western Pacific Ocean
The best time to go diving at Buena Ken is in April and November
Torajaland is a village with unique roof design houses
The roof is extends high up in the air
This style of front roof is called Tongkonan
The purpose of this house is to store corpses for the ceremony
After a person dies, it will be stored in the house for several days until the funeral
Mount Bromo is in the Tankersley mountains in the east of Java island
Currently the volcano is still smoldering
Although this mountain is not the highest, it is the most well-known and it is a popular tourist destination
Bali island has always been the popular island of the world
It had received several awards in tourism for many years because of its beautiful landscape
The coast and the tropical beaches are great for diving and surfing
Bali is the dream destination for tourists around the world
Gili Islands is a great place for relaxation for tourists
The group is made up of 3 islands
For those who want to lean back on the white sandy beach and enjoy the beach cafe playing reggae music, without the city noise pollution, Gili islands is the place
Komodo National Park
The name of the island is named after the Komodo dragon, which is the largest living reptiles there
The dragon can grow to 3 meters or more in length and can weigh more than 70 kg
Komodo dragon will eat the carcass of a dead animal but it still has a reputation as a formidable predator
They prey birds and mammals
But rarely attack humans
Salamad Siang
Salamad Siang
Language: Indonesian is the official language
Population: Local indonesian and diverse group of islanders
Religion: Islam is the prominent one
Government system: Democracy with President as the leader
Currency: Rupiah
Indonesia's national flower is the Moon Orchid
This is one of the longest blooming orchids
The boughs and flowers can last up to 2-6 months but it will bloom only 2-3 times a year
The Moon Orchids can grow well in humid weather
It is widely seen in the lowlands of Indonesia
Gado-gado (Gado Gado) is the popular food of Indonesia
It consists of various types of vegetables and grains
Gado-gado is meant to have with peanut sauce that is similar to the satay sauce
The herb in the sauce makes the sauce less creamy compared to satay sauce with coconut milk
Kebaya is the national attire of Indonesia
For women, there is a long-sleeved buttoned shirt with colorful fabric and embroidered lace design
For skirt, they wear the batik sarong
The attire for men usually is a batik shirt and trousers or Teluk Beskap
which is a hybrid between a shorter coat and a Javanese sarong
Jakarta is the largest city in Indonesia
The original name of the city was Batavia
This capital city is located in the northwest of the Java island
Jakarta is a modern and beautiful city
It is the center of every aspect of Indonesia including economic, government, educational resources
It is also the major attraction for tourism of the country
Baphuon Temple of Angkor is the first of temple castle among the many castles in the city
There is a long corridor extends through the castle as a elevated stone bridge
The castle is located in the property of Royal Palace
It is a castle with high mounts
Today the castle is deteriorated and being restored steadily
Ancient Art of Bayon and Angkor Wat and the Art of Angkor Wat
Majority is in the murals depiction of ancient history but there is no pattern of organic shapes
The center of the image is smaller and also has images of large animals
Tonle Sap or Khmer Lake
Cambodia has the freshwater lake created by the Mekong River
It is the largest in lake in Asia, named "Tonle Sap" The Mekong River flows through Cambodia for a distance of 500 kilometers and then enters to Vietnam and to the South China Sea
Mekhong is an international river and believed that there is the giant catfish, which is the world's largest freshwater fish
swimming upstream from the Tonle Sap to Thailand - Laos prior to mating in the China region, where the river begins
Sihanouk Ville is the holiday spot and the only deep-water seaport in Cambodia
It is a small province in southern Cambodia
The port city is important for economic and tourism of Cambodia
Traditionally, this port city is known as "The city of Kampong Som", which is the name of the deep water port
The place is the best place for vacation in Cambodia for locals and tourists
Ream National Park and Beach
Now there are many tourists from western countries
Ream National Park is a resemblance of a safari, where you will experience the diversity of local animals such as deer, armadillo
and rare species of dolphin like albino dolphin, which can be seen only during the month of December through February only
Shuo Sa Dai
Shuo Sa Dai
Language: Khmer is the official language
Population: Mainly Cambodians
Religion: Buddhism (Theravada) is the prominent one

text.text: Government system: Parliamentary Democracy with the King
text.subtitle: Government system: Parliamentary Democracy with the King who is under the constitution
Currency : Riel
Cambodia's national flower is White cheesewood flowers
It has the white and yellowish color
Petals are somewhat thick and stiff
Its smell is refreshing and believed to a sacred plant
because it represents the refreshing fragrance as flowers of the ladies
Amok is a popular dish of Cambodia
This dish is very similar to Hormok or steamed fish curry of Thailand
It is made by mixing fresh fish, coconut milk, and chili to cook by steaming
In addition to the use of fish for this dish, some people may replace with chicken
Cambodian's national dress is Sampot or Cambodian fabric sheet
It is handwoven and meant for covering the shirt around the waist
Fabric is made of silk or cotton or a combination of both
Sampot for women is similar to the fabric sheet of Laos and Thailand
There are several design of Sampot
vary according to the social class of the Cambodian people

Phnom Penh is the capital of Cambodia.
Another name is Capital Phnom Penh
located in the central region (slightly off to the south)
Phnom Penh is considered as the largest and most important city of Cambodia
where political and governmental offices reside
The business district with international investment is also here
Luang Prabang is in northern Laos, bordered by the Mekong River
The city is most fascinating, filled with ancient temples
There are traces and ruins of colonial architecture
The life here is full of cultural identities
It is not surprising that it has been registered as the World Heritage Site
Wat Xieng Thong is located to the northeast of Luang Prabang
The temple was designed with Lanna architectural style and is regarded by archaeologists as one of the most beautiful architecture in Laos
Now tourists from all over the world have come to appreciate its beauty
In addition beautiful design, it is a monastery of invaluable soul of Laos
Vang Vieng is a natural attraction, located in Vang Vieng near Song Riverside
The city is surrounded by mountains and rivers
Geographically, its untouched beauty can make a great tourist destination
It offers panoramic views of the mountain range
Visitors will experience the aura of cultural life in rural area of Laos
The Mekong River is the longest river in Southeast Asia with a length of 4,350 kilometers
Laos is bordering the Mekong River as well
Laos people also use Mekong River for commuting
The scenery along the banks reflects the lifestyle of the Laos people and the natural beauty that make the trip to Mekong River so memorable
Pha That Luang is a Buddhist site located in the city
According to legend, 5 Laos monks traveled to study Buddhism in India and brought Bones of the chest of the lord to reside in Vientiane
The royal of that period commanded to build the Pha That Luang for containing the relics for worship
This place is a sanctuary that has sentimental value to Laos people, like the heart and soul of the whole country
Si Phan Don, the name translates to four thousand islands
This archipelago is located in the Mekong River in Southern Laos before flowing into Cambodia
Villagers are in the fishery and still living the simplest lives in the countryside
This area is really charming and peaceful
Sabaidee
Sabaidee
Language: Laos is the official language
Population: Laotian are the majority along tribal groups
Religion: Buddhism
Government system: Social Communism
Currency: Kip
The official flower of Laos is the Dok Champa
Thai people know this flower as Leelawadee
There are many colors of this flower
It can be in pink, yellow, red, or other color tones
Dok Champa is meaningful as the representation of happiness and honesty
So it is often seen as the decorative element in ceremonial events
Luang Prabang Salad is the renowned dish in Laos
The flavor of this salad is simple and neutral
which can be enjoyable for people of the East and the West
Laos women wear a sarong looks like a skirt and wear long sleeves of cylindrical shape
Clothing for men are often international
Sometimes they wear a polite loincloth with the stud coat with seven seeds
similar to the royal coat of Thailand
Vientiane is the capital city of Laos
located in the central part of the country near the Mekong Region
Vientiane is close to Nong Khai, Thailand
Vientiane is an ancient city with over a thousand years of history
Vientiane is the biggest city of Laos
It is the city with the most dense population
Vientiane was once under the authority of France
Wat Chawenando is constructed with teak wood with delicate carvings of the Buddha
Ten Reincarnations of the Buddha and the beauty of the original Burmese Temple exposed through the magnificent of Burmese art
National Museum is the place for the statue of the Altar of Sihnat's golden throne of King's Mindong of Mandalay
It is 8 meters tall, built of wood, carved and gilded elegantly
The museum also has a collection of early antiques and art objects
Pagoda Botahtaung is a pagoda that was built to contain the King's hair in the Shwedagon Pagoda
When the King's hair is brought up from the boat it was enshrined in the pagoda Botahtaung
The pagoda is different from the typical pagoda in the way that it has prominent walk way to go inside
By invoking the relics of the gold casket to be visible to people who come to worship
The south wall of the pagoda had gold and other treasures that Burmese Buddhist pagoda brought for display
Reclining Buddha Chowtaji of Yangoon
This Buddha statue was special that at the foot is a paintings of meaningful Buddhist element, the Sacred wheel pattern
At the center of the foot is adhered the sacred depic of properous enlightenment in 108 cases
Maha Chedi Shwedagon is the great twin pagoda that represents the soul of the country, aged more than 2,500 years
The pagoda gives the people the authority and act as the spirit of the Burmese
There is a place for making a wish
This is where Burengnong, the former Prince of Burma would come before the war
The pagoda is an astonishingly beautiful creation
Lei Su Pagoda is an octagonal from the sacred bell to the floor up to the upside down bowl
The Pagoda is built with a dedication to the  Sulenut, one of the four divines associated with the legend of the great Shwedagon Pagoda
Minggalaba
Minggalaba
Language: English is the official language of Burma
Population: The majority is Burmese
Religion: Buddhism
Government system: Democracy
Currency: Burmese Kyat
Burma's national flower is the Paduak
It is very abundant in Burma
Its golden yellow has the fragrance like the first drops of rain
During the month of April, when the people celebrate the new year
Burmese believe that Paduak is the symbol of strength, durability
In Burmese culture, flowers are indispensable in all their ritual ceremonies
Lahpet is a popular dish of Burma
Marinated tea leaves are served with side vegetable and sauce
The leaf will wrap everything the same way and a spring roll
Lahpet is an indispensable dish for special occasions and festivals of Burmese people
It is said that if a party or any celebration doesn't serve Lahpet
it is assumed that there is a lack of perfection
National dress of Burmese is called Long Yi
which a sarong for both men and women for various special occasion
Men will wear a shirt with Mandarin collar and collarless cloak
Sometimes they will wear a head piece called the Guang Baung
The Burmese women usually wear a shirt with buttons in the front called Yinzi
and another type with buttons on the side, called Yinbon
They will also wear a cloth over their shoulder
The capital city is Naypyidaw, which just became the new capital of Myanmar
in the place of Yangon that was the historic capital for so long
The main reason to move is to make administrative activities more convenient
since Naypyidaw in the middle of the country
Naypyidaw is still in the process of construction buildings and infrastructure
Major business district and tourist areas are soon to be ready
Because Myanmar has just opened the country for international affairs
many investors from around the world are choosing Naypyidaw
Genting Highlands >> The city has been referred to as "City of Entertainment" which is the perfect for everyone in the family of all budget
The Genting Highlands is 6,000 feet above the sea level so it weather is really nice
Petronas is the tallest twin tower in the world with a height of 452 meters floor
There are a 88-stories owned by the oil compnay, the Petronas, same name as the building itself
The building design was inspired by the characteristics of the five pillars of Islam
The beauty and the height of the building is stunning
The building is also the place of knowledge, art, culture, music, entertainment, and shopping
Merdeka Square is the home of the tallest flagpole in the world
The flag of Malaysia is drawn up to the top of the post
The height of the dome is 40 meters and the clock tower that is boasting the beauty of the place at night time
There will be glittering lights decorating the building at night as well
Menara Kuala Lumpur is sitting at the top of Bukitnanas mountain, which is the fourth tallest tower for television and telecommunication
Putrajaya is a vast area covering the whole mountain, which was created as a new city
This is the region for government ministries, parliament, and the Prime Minister's home
Surrounding area Putrajaya is a made up of beautiful housing community and condominiums
Salamuddatung
Salamuddatung
Language: Malay is the official language
Other languages used are English and Chinese
Population: Mostly Malays
Religion: Islam is the prominent one
Government system: Democratic Congress
Currency: Ringgit
The national flower is a flower Hibiscus (Bunga Raya), locally known as potpourri
and commonly known as the red hibiscus with the red petals
Its stamens extends over the flowers, which is the symbol of Malaysia
to represent the solidarity and tolerance in the nation
It is believed to contribute to the noble and elegant
Nasi Lemak is the popular dish of Malaysia
Nasi Lemak is rice cooked with coconut milk and pandan, meant to be eaten with 4 sides
including fried anchovies, cucumber, hard boiled egg, and baked beans
Malaysia's national attire for men is called Baju Melayu
which consists of long sleeves shirt and long pants made of silk or cotton
For women, it is called the Baju Kurung, which consists of jacket with long sleeves and long skirt
For the typical Malays, they like to wear clothing with bright colors with gorgeous flower pattern
Kuala Lumpur is the capital city of Malaysia, located on the west side of the country (Near the Andaman sea)
It is the largest and most important city of the country
Although the government administrative offices have moved to anothor city center Putrajaya already
but other important places are still in Kuala Lumpur
The city is typically known as Kuala Lumpur but Malaysian call it "KL"
which stands for Kuala Lumpur itself
Fort Santiago was the frontest fort to defend attacks from the enemy
It has been subsequently restored to as the Shrine of Freedom
Area around the fort are lushful garden
There is a carriage service for sightseeing around the area
Makati City is a famous as the shopping and business district of Manila's metropolitan
There are series of 5 star hotels here as well as 4 gigantic department stores
Intramuros is located in Manila
The structure resembles a fortress walls and a moat
This is center of education, culture, religion and trade
Paksunghun is a great place for water rafting
You will enjoy the adventurous boatride upstream as well as refreshen by the fresh water flowing through and the beauty of natural surroundings
Ta-Al Lake is a lake with a volcano in the middle
On top of this mountain is a community with houses and bungalows as well as shops and restaurants
The breeze is nice and cool, other than the picturesque view of the upper Manila
There is a very popular tourist destination called the Takaitai
There is a large lake surrounded by mountains
Best part is the smallest and most dangerous volcano named Mount TAAL VOLCANO that can erupt anytime
This place is charming in the beautiful and dangerous way
Boracay Island is one of the best Philippines' archipelago
It was rewarded as the most beautiful island in the world
Boracay Island is a tropical island located south of Manila
Boracay has two main tourist beaches; White Beach and Bulabog Beach
Palawan is the most beautiful island in the Philippines
It is famous and favorited among tourists
It is also a hot destination for divers
Exotic corals and sea animals are fascinating here
Kumusta
Kumusta
Language: Filipino and English are the official language
A local dialect is Tagalog
Population: Mainly Malay, some Chinese
Religion: Christianity, Roman Catholic 83%, Protestant, Muslim 5%
Government system: Democracy with President as the head and chief executive
Currency: Peso
The national flower of Philippines is the Sampaguita Jasmine
The flowers are white and its fragrance at night is the best
The flower blooms at night, as the symbol of purity, simplicity, humility, and strong
Adobo is a popular dish of the Philippines
It is made from pork or chicken, marinated and seasoned through the cooking process
oven-baked or fried, then served with hot rice
In the past time, this dish is for travelers to bring along since the Adobo can be kept for a long time
It is the ideal as food for a trek
Currently, Adobo has become a good and simple dish for any meals
Men wear trousers and a shirt called Barong Tagalog that is sewn with silk from pineapple
It shirt has long sleeves, upright collar, and wrist sleeves are embroidered
Women wear long skirt with white short sleeves pleated above the shoulder like butterfly wings called balintawak
Manila is the capital city of the Philippines, located on the Eastern shore of
the Luzon island, which is the largest island of the country
It is the heart of the country where economic center, education, culture, tourism, and industrial areas reside
Manila had been ruled by the Spain, and is under the supervision of the United States for a total of 400 years
Orchard Road, the agricultural road once busy with pepper and spice garden
Now this road turned into the main shopping street of Singapore, filled with shops, restaurants, hotels, and department stores

sg.name: place7
sg.display_name: Kwan Im Thong Hood Cho Temple

text.subtitle: Kwan Im Thong Hood Cho Temple
People believe that making wishes here can be fulfilled
Do not be surprised when you see the crowd of queuing to pray in temple
If you believed in superstition, the temple has the fortune sticks that  is famous for accurate fortune telling
With the high number of visitor, the temple prohibits taking photos inside the temple
Clarke Quay is the best Eat and Drink district with many well known restaurants and pubs
It is at the estruary of the Singapore River
It is great for anytime of day
Marina Bay Sands is the five-star resort on the Bay, renowned to be the massive national project with three great hotels to connecting
It is also the entertainment central with the worldclass casinos
Sky garden has the most luxurious outdoor swimming pool, being at the highest elevation in the world
The first Museums of art and science in the world is here, considered to be the main attractions that you should not miss when visiting Singapore

sg.name: place5
sg.display_name: Sri Mari Amman & Buddha Tooth Relic Temple

text.subtitle: Sri Mari Amman Temple is an old Hindu temple in Singapore, located in Chinatown
Thai people know this as the Hindu Temple of Singapore
Around the temple are sculptures, statues, and figurines in bright colors
It is believed that if you walk clockwise around the temple odd numbers of time, you will be fortunate
During October - November of each year there will be a traditional fire running (Timiti) as the annual festival at this temple
Buddha Tooth Relic Temple is the Chinese temple of Tang Dynasty, designed with mixed Art of Mandala
The grand temple is stting at Chinatown
At the top floor of the temple contains relics, the tooth of Buddha in gold stupa
In addition, the temple also has a small Buddhism museum for homage to the study and revisit
Sian Hock Keng Temple is the temple of happiness in heaven
It was built to honor the goddess of the sea
It is believed to help protect the refugees to arrive on the island of Singapore safely
This temple is very elegant and is known as the most beautiful temple in Singapore
One miraculous fact about this temple is that it was constructed without one single nail
Marina Bay is a waterfront tourist spot at Singapore estuary
This is the site of luxury shopping, five-star restaurants, brand name stores, cinemas, broadway theaters, and leading resorts
Universal Studios is the famous park in Sentosa district
Eventhough it is a branch of the International Amusement from the U.S.
but an amusement park was designed and customized in the favor of local tourists
It is surprisingly popular among Singaporeans
The unique character of this Universal Studio is the attraction
Nihao
Nihao
Language: Malay is the official language
Mandarin and English are encouraged for work and everyday life
Population: Majority is Chinese
Religion: Buddhism

text.text: Government system: The President of the Republic
text.subtitle: Government system: The President of the Republic is the Head of State
Currency: Singapore dollar
Vanda orchids is the national flower in Singapore
Its beautiful fresh color of purple and how it blooms all year long makes it a good representation of wealth and beauty
Laksa is the name of the famous dish of Singapore
Laksa is a noodle soup with coconut milk and it is very similar to Northern Thailand's dish, Khao soi noodle
However Laksa is enjoyable with or without coconut milk but people prefer it with the coconut milk
Singapore does not have its own national dress because Singapore is divided into
four main ethnic groups; Chinese, Malay, Indian, and European
Each one has its own national dress
Singapore has no official capital city
Since the country is a small island, the whole country itself is a capital
Singapore has no natural resources but it is growing significantly
It is the economic center for Regional Finance and Investment
There are many foreign companies set up offices in Singapore
Airport and local transportation system is the most advanced in the Asean region
Population's quality of life is high attracting people from all over the world
Phu Pa Poh in Loey province. The place is also known as the Fuji mountain of Loey
ภูป่าเปาะ หรือ ฟูจิเมืองเลย จังหวัดเลย>> เป็นแหล่งท่องเที่ยวน้องใหม่ในจังหวัดเลย
The view of mountain is beautiful here, especially the sunrise in earliest morning
ที่ให้ทัศนียภาพในการชมภูหอ ได้สวยงาม โดยเฉพาะในช่วงเวลายามเช้า
From the viewpoint, you will see the peak reaching up to the cloud of fog
ก่อนแสงของวันใหม่กำลังจะขึ้น นักท่องเที่ยวจะได้เห็นยอดของภูหอที่สูงเสียดฟ้า อยู่ท่ามกลางกลุ่มหมอกและก้อนเมฆ
Thong Phaphum in Karnchanaburi province. This region comprised of various landscape scenery such as rain forest, grassland, valley, and waterways
ทองผาภูมิ จังหวัดกาญจนบุรี>เป็นสถานที่ท่องเที่ยวที่มีความหลากหลายทางภูมิประเทศ ทั้งป่าไม้ ทุ่งหญ้า หุบเขา และแหล่งน้ำสำคัญ
Beside the lush natural surroundings, the pure fresh air is much better than in Bangkok
นอกจากธรรมชาติสมบูรณ์แล้ว ยังอากาศดีอีกด้วย
There is the Pilok mine, which is the landmark of this province that you should not miss
โดยมี เหมืองปิล๊อก จุดแลนด์มาร์คของที่นี่ ที่ทุกคนไม่ควรพลาด

th.name: place1
th.display_name: วัดในกรุงเทพฯ

text.subtitle: Temple of the Emerald Buddha is the royal temple of higher status
วัดพระศรีรัตนศาสดาราม หรือที่เรียกกันทั่วไปว่า วัดพระแก้ว
The Pagoda has the Langka style
เป็นพระอารามหลวงชั้นพิเศษ เป็นเจดีย์ทรงลังกา
The King Rama IV ordered to build to enshrine relics that he had brought from Lanka
พระบาทสมเด็จพระจอมเกล้าเจ้าอยู่หัว (รัชกาลที่ 4) โปรดเกล้าฯ ให้สร้างขึ้นเพื่อประดิษฐานพระบรมสารีริกธาตุที่ทรงได้มาจากลังกา
The floor plan is according to the form of the great stupa in Wat Phra Sri Sanpetch in Ayutthaya province
โดยสร้างตามรูปแบบของพระมหาเจดีย์ในวัดพระศรีสรรเพชญ์ พระนครศรีอยุธยา
Phra Prang of Wat Arun Ratchawararam is commonly known as Wat Arun
พระปรางค์ วัดอรุณราชวราราม ราชวรมหาวิหาร หรือที่นิยมเรียกกันสั้น ๆ ว่า วัดอรุณฯ
It is an ancient temple built in the Ayutthaya period
เป็นวัดโบราณ สร้างในสมัยอยุธยา
The special monastery was also built as the official royal temple during the reign of King Rama II
รวมทั้งเป็นพระอารามหลวงชั้นเอกพิเศษ ชนิดราชวรมหาวิหาร เป็นวัดประจำรัชกาลที่ 2
Phra Prang is fine, elegant and most notable at the south side of Wat Arun
พระปรางค์ เป็นศิลปกรรมที่สง่างามและโดดเด่นที่สุดในวัดอรุณฯ ตั้งอยู่หน้าวัดทางทิศใต้
The Phra Prang was originally built during the Ayutthaya period along with the Sanctuary and the smaller Buddhist cathedral

พระปรางค์องค์นี้เดิมสร้างมาตั้งแต่สมัยกรุงศรีอยุธยา เป็นปูชนียสถานที่สร้างขึ้นพร้อมกับโบสถ์และวิหารน้อยหน้าพระปรางค์ang was originally built during the Ayutthaya period along with the Sanctuary and the smaller Buddhist cathedral
Wat Benchamabophit is the royal temple for the first officer
วัดเบญจมบพิตรดุสิตวนาราม ราชวรวิหาร
This temple is known to tourists worldwide as "The Marble Temple" The temple balcony is made with best marble from Italy
เป็นพระอารามหลวงชั้นเอก ชนิดราชวรวิหาร ซึ่งพระอุโบสถของวัด เป็นวัดที่รู้จักของนักท่องเที่ยวทั่วโลกว่า "The Marble Temple"  เพราะพระอุโบสถ พระระเบียง ประดับด้วยหินอ่อนที่ดีที่สุดจากประเทศอิตาลี
Additionally, the temple has exquisite architecture with ancient Thai arts
ประกอบกับเป็นวัดที่มีความวิจิตรงดงามด้วยศิลปะสถาปัตยกรรมไทยโบราณ
Therefore, a great number of both in local Thai people and tourists are visiting this temple everyday
จึงมีนักท่องเที่ยวทั้งชาวไทยและชาวต่างประเทศสนใจเข้าชมจำนวนมาก
The temple was built in the reign of King Rama V
พระอุโบสถสร้างขึ้นในสมัยพระบาทสมเด็จพระจุลจอมเกล้าเจ้าอยู่หัว (รัชกาลที่ 5)
Suan Phung district in Ratchaburi province. Suan Phung is still be very much appreciated by the local Thai people
อ.สวนผึ้ง จังหวัดราชบุรี>> อำเภอสวนผึ้ง ยังคงได้รับความนิยมอย่างมาก
as a weekend destination because it is not far from Bangkok
เนื่องจากเป็นสถานที่ไม่ไกลจากกรุงเทพฯ ใช้เวลาเดินทางไม่มากนัก
The weather is good and the mountaineer landscape is overwhelming
และยังมีความหลากหลายทางภูมิศาสตร์ และภูมิอากาศอีกด้วย
There are many chic resorts opened up in Suan Phung to provide services and activities for photographs as well as accomodation
มีรีสอร์ทมากมายเปิดขึ้นมา เป็นทั้งที่พัก และมีกิจกกรรมต่างๆให้ทำ เหมาะที่จะพักผ่อนและมาถ่ายภาพ

th.name: place6
th.display_name: ตลาดร่มหุบ

text.subtitle: Talad Romhoob in Samut Songkram province. This outdoor market is also known as Mae Klong Market
ตลาดร่มหุบ จังหวัดสมุทรสงคราม>> ตลาดร่มหุบ หรือ ตลาดแม่กลอง
This market offers an adventurous shopping experience in the world
น่าจะเป็นสถานที่จับจ่ายสินค้าที่ชวนหวาดเสียวที่สุดในโลก
All merchants set up the shop along two sides of the railway
ไม่น่าจะเกินจริงแต่อย่างใด เพราะเหล่าบรรดาแม่ค้าพ่อค้า ต่างตั้งแผงสองข้างทางรถไฟ ส่วนลูกค้าก็อาศัยทางรถไฟเป็นถนน ไว้เดินดูของกินของใช้
So when the train comes, all merchants will have to hurry and retract the umbrella, which translate to the nickname Romhoob market
และเมื่อรถไฟมา พ่อค้าแม่ค้าก็รีบเก็บร้าน และหุบร่มของตน
The visitors must also get out of the way
ลูกค้าก็จะต้องหลบด้วยเช่นกัน
When the train passed an umbrella and the things will slide back in place and the shopping resumes
เมื่อขบวนรถผ่านไป จึงจะกางร่ม ซึ่งระยะห่างระหว่างรถไฟกับแผงร้านค้าห่างกันไม่ถึง 2 เมตร
Visitors are literally walking on the railway as they shop at this market
ลูกค้าก็จะกลับมาเดินบนทางรถไฟเช่นเดิม

th.name: place5
th.display_name: หมู่บ้านคีรีวง

text.subtitle: Khiriwong village in Nakorn Si Thammarat Province is the oldest community in the royal foothills in Nakhon Si Thammarat
หมู่บ้านคีรีวง จังหวัดนครศรีธรรมราช>> เป็นชุมชนเก่าแก่ในบริเวณเชิงเขาหลวง ในจังหวัดนครศรีธรรมราช
Many people who have visited this village were told was that it was an exotic oasis, its beauty lies in the peacefulness
นักท่องเที่ยวหลายๆ คน ที่ได้ไปเยือนหมู่บ้านแห่งนี้ ต่างบอกเป็นเสียงเดียวกันว่า สวยงาม สงบท่ามกลางหุบเขา
The pure fresh air and the tranquility are for those who long for peace
และที่สำคัญอากาศสดชื่นบริสุทธิ์มาก เหมาะสำหรับผู้ต้องการความสงบ เพื่อหลีกหนีความวุ่นวายในเมืองใหญ่
Koh Ngai in Trang province. The islands is part of the Lanta archipelago
เกาะไหง จังหวัดตรัง>> อยู่ในอุทยานแห่งชาติหมู่เกาะลันตา
Now Koh Ngai is getting a lot of attention from tourists as the relaxing destination
ในปัจจุบัน เกาะไหง ได้รับความสนใจจากนักท่องเที่ยวมากขึ้น
Sawasdee
สวัสดีครับ
Sawasdee
สวัสดีค่ะ
Language: Thai
ภาษา: ไทย
Population: Thai
ประชากร: คนไทย
Religion: Buddhism (Theravada)
ศาสนา: พุทธ

text.text: Government system: Democracy with the King
text.subtitle: Government system: Democracy with the King as the principal

text.text: Government system: Democracy with the King
text.subtitle: การปกครอง: ประชาธิปไตยโดยมีพระมหากษัตริย์เป็นประมุข
Currency: Thai Baht
สกุลเงิน: บาท
Thailand's national flower is the golden shower
ดอกไม้ประจำชาติของไทย คือ ดอกราชพฤกษ์ ที่มีสีเหลืองสวยสง่างาม
When blooming, it gives the warm feeling
เมื่อเบ่งบานแล้วให้ความรู้สึกอบอุ่น
It is considered to be the symbol of dignity
ถือเป็นสัญลักษณ์ของความมีเกียรติยศศักดิ์ศรี
The people of Thailand call the flower dok ratchapruek or dok koon
ซึ่งชาวไทยหลายคนรู้จักกันดีในนามของ ดอกคูน
The golden yellow color is believed to be the color of Buddhism and glory
โดยมีความเชื่อว่าสีเหลืองอร่ามของดอกราชพฤกษ์คือสีแห่งพระพุทธศาสนาและความรุ่งโรจน์
The incredible number of small yellow flowers is also the symbol of the nation unity as well
รวมทั้งยังเป็นสัญลักษณ์แห่งความสามัคคีปรองดองของคนในชาติอีกด้วย
The flowers are blooming from February through May
โดยดอกราชพฤกษ์จะเบ่งบานในช่วงเดือนกุมภาพันธ์ – พฤษภาคม
featuring the bloom at defoliation leaving just glowing yellow flowers of Dok Ratchapruek
มีจุดเด่นเวลาเบ่งบานคือการผลัดใบออกจนหมดต้น เหลือไว้เพียงแค่สีเหลืองอร่ามของดอกราชพฤกษ์เท่านั้น
Tom Yum Goong is a famous Thai dish
ต้มยำกุ้ง เป็นอาหาที่มีชื่อเสียงของไทย
It is a hot and sour soup with prawn
เป็นอาหารคาวที่เหมาะสำหรับรับประทานกับข้าวสวยร้อน ๆ
The base of the soup is made with herbs like lemongrass and galangal
กลิ่นหอมของสมุนไพรที่เป็นส่วนประกอบในต้มยำกุ้ง นอกจากจะทำให้รู้สึกสดชื่นแล้ว
The spicy soup is renowned worldwide
ยังช่วยกระตุ้นการเจริญอาหารได้เป็นอย่างดี
National dress of Thailand is known as "Royal Thai Favorites"
สำหรับชุดประจำชาติอย่างเป็นทางการของไทย รู้จักกันในนามว่า “ชุดไทยพระราชนิยม”
The national dress for men is called "Royal Gift"
โดยชุดประจำชาติสำหรับสุภาพบุรุษ จะเรียกว่า “เสื้อพระราชทาน”
For women, it is a dress with the fabric cover across the chest
สำหรับสุภาพสตรีจะเป็นชุดไทยที่ประกอบด้วยสไบเฉียง ใช้ผ้ายกมีเชิงหรือยกทั้งตัว
wearing a silver belt as an ornament
ซิ่นมีจีบยกข้างหน้า มีชายพกใช้เข็มขัดไทยคาด
These dress are only since in religious and traditional ceremonies
ส่วนท่อนบนเป็นสไบ สามารถใช้เครื่องประดับตกแต่งได้ตามโอกาส
The capital city of Thailand is Bangkok
เมืองหลวง : กรุงเทพมหานคร
located in the central region closed to the sea with the Chao Phraya river running through
กรุงเทพมหานครตั้งอยู่ในภาคกลางของประเทศไทยบริเวณใกล้ปากแม่น้ำเจ้าพระยา
Now Bangkok is the business center where government and commercial building reside
ปัจจุบันกรุงเทพมหานครเป็นศูนย์กลางการค้าการลงทุน การบริหาราชการแผ่นดิน การเมืองการปกครองของประเทศไทย
There are many worldwide famous tourist attraction places
และยังแหล่งท่องเที่ยวที่ได้รับความนิยมจากนักท่องเที่ยวทั่วโลกอีกด้วย
Sapa Vietnam is a mountain city in northern Vietnam, near the China border
Originally was the French's resort town of the upper class who came for business in Vietnam
Therefore, urban plannin and architecture are of French colonial
A remarkable place is the Catholic Church at town center
Hong Kiem Lake or Return of the Sword Lake
This lake is located in the heart of old Hanoi
There are legends of the people saying that God Le Thai Yo had brought the magic sword that fought to free the country in his boat to return to the holy turtle
This is the story of the name of this lake
In the middle of the lake is an ancient pagoda rising from the water, called Thap Rua, which means the Turtle Tower
Ngoc Son Temple is at a lake on the Jade Island
This is a small island that anyone can cross over the The Huc bridge or bridge of the sun
Temple is painted in bright red
This is a unique place to visit in Hanoi
Water Puppet Theatre. The show is about the native traditions
Water puppet is the puppet show only available in Hanoi
The performers are behind the bamboo curtain
The technique is to not show the sticks that hold up th puppet
The beauty is in the unique movement of the puppets
In Thailand there are some Puppet shows available in Pattaya
Halong Bay, Vietnam. Geographically Vietnam has a long coast extending from north to south
The altitude differences result a variety of weather condition
The average temperature is around 22 degrees Celsius but the weather can be divided according to three parts: the northern, central and southern regions
City of Hue. Attractions in Hue are fortress, Royal Palace, and Archaeological imperial tombs that has been listed by the UNESCO as a World Heritage Site in 1993
Now Hue is one of the most popular tourist destination in Vietnam
Lake Danang is located in Binh Dinh Province, which is the central coast of Vietnam between Danang and Nha Trang
Topography of Binh Dinh Province is diverse and interesting
There are lowland, forests, plains, lakes, and beaches within a single province
Ho Chi Minh City, or Saigon as the original name
It is the port city of the south and is the current central business district of Vietnam
Zinchao
Zinchao
Language: Vietnamese
Population: Vietnamese
Religion: Buddhism (Mahayana)
Government system: Socialism
Currency: Dong
Vietnam has the lotus as the national flower, also known as
the "Flowers of Dawn" which is the symbol of purity, commitment, and optimistic
Lotus is often mentioned in Vietnamese poems and songs frequently
Vietnamese Spring Roll is considered one of the most famous dish of Vietnam
The delicious Vietnamese spring rolls  is in the flour, which is made from rice
The rice wrap is used to roll all the filling into fresh spring rolls
The addition of fresh vegetables and herbs make it so refreshing
It is normally served with a sweet fish sauce
Ao dai is the national dress of Vietnam
It is consisted of a fitted silk dress worn over trousers
The dress is often seen in a wedding and ceremonial occasion
Ao dai resembles the Chinese Cheongsam dress
It is only popular for Vietnamese women
Vietnamese men will wear men's Ao dai only to a wedding or a funeral
Hanoi was once the capital city of North Vietnam
When the North Vietnam defeated the Vietnam War, North and South were combined into one Vietnam
Therefore, established Hanoi as the official capital city of the country
(The former capital city of South Vietnam was Saigon or what is called Ho Chi Minh City today)
Hanoi is like other capital cities in the Southeast Asia, acting as the largest city and most important city of the country
But in Vietnam, the largest city for trade, investment, industrial
and maritime transportation is the city of Ho Chi Minh City
